title: S17 Ep132: Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Halloween 2022 Edition
itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Halloween 2022 Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Halloween 2022 Edition w/ Beer City Bruiser!

The world is knee deep in Spooky Season, and the stories are full on spooky, the veil is getting thinner and people are having supernatural experiences, scary, strange, and hilarious!  Also,  Cruiser and Bruiser have gathered some interesting Supernatural stories from around the world this week just for you!

This week, The city of Wyandotte, Michigan cancels Trick or Treating when a real life monster comes to town!  An Italian Military man goes on trial for investigating reports of UFOs and Aliens, while the the tourism industry in Italy is being built around... the ghost of Mussolini?!  A screaming tree shaped creature is spotted in Oxford, and a woman takes up a new hobby of cooking up recipes she finds on gravestones. 

A family in Illinois made the coolest Halloween decoration based on the show, Stranger Things! Check out how they defied gravity here:  https://www.upi.com/Odd_News/2022/10/31/Plainfield-Illinois-Stranger-Things-Halloween-display/6291667248267/

Check out our new site, https://www.darknessradioshow.com/ to find all of our old archives, leave us a voice message for parashare, read our blogs, and much more!

Find out where Beer City Bruiser is holding his breath and needlepointing near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
